title: Holy Garen Ult Buffs!
body:
Garen
Demacian Justice ( R) cooldown lowered to 120/100/80 from 160/120/80

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/03/327-pbe-update.html

replies.body: With DFG removed they had to give him something
It's hardly a buff, but its something he's been needing. A nearly 3 minute cooldown was too much.
That is a huge buff for him.

i main garen, early game the damage you do isnt really much with his ult so ill stick to much guns and say its not a massive buff. and at tier 3 its still the same. It is a nice buff, but it just makes his presence in lane a bit more effective.

Exactly, and Garen relies on his laning phase...

I don't see how you can say that is not a huge buff, but maybe that is just me...
well we'll see how it works out when it comes live

Darius:
Ult reset and at Lvl 3 Full Reset on kill
Pfffff that was a gimmick that worked, but this is something he's needed for a long time.
